name: Tiles Puzzle (15 puzzle)
description:
It is the famous 15 Puzzle game!
Ready for the iPhone 5!

Why Tiles Puzzle is the best sliding puzzle from App Store??

- It has the best sliding algorithm ever! The tiles movement are smooth and you can drag more than one tile at once. See for yourself!

- You can play with pictures taken from the camera, choose your photo albums pictures, select among 60 beautiful images included in the app or play with your Facebook friends photos!

- You can play against your friends online with the multiplayer mode.

- Is the puzzle too difficult or too easy for you? That's ok, change between the 3 difficulties available.

- You will play with gorgeous images taking full advantage of the Retina display from the latest generation devices.

- There is an option that shows the numbers in the tiles when an image is too difficult to solve.

- There is a preview button that shows the original image while you play.

- You can compare your time with millions of people around the world. Yes! We have Game Center included!

- It is a universal app and ready for iPhone 5!

- It is FREE!
